data.name: Raubritter Demo
data.detailed_description:
Demo Version of EA Raubritter

It is a 0.2 Version of the game.

Co-Op
It contains 10% of the games world.
5 starting quests - explaining- how to play
The sanbox part of the buildings - so you decide what you want to build
Some of the premade buildings like workbench, sawbench, fireplace
1 village
5 types of animals
bow shooting, fighting
save system, settings.

To sum it up 5% of content available in the EA is in the Demo but 85% of the features available in the EA

data.short_description: Ready for a medieval survival experience? You want to build but also fight? That is a game for you. You have been robbed from your title and lands. Survive in the dark forest, rob merchants, burn villages, build a camp, gather a fearsome band and reclaim what is rightfully yours!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL Core i5 9600K
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL Core i5 9600K
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This is a violent medieval world. The demo is much more gentle, than the main game, but still it contains fighting, killing, robbing. 

In addition, in younger players, it may lead to the conclusion that robbing someone is fun and a right thing to do. Please keep your children out of this game or make sure they understand it is only a game.
